text: I can finally do it I ve had suicidal thoughts since I was    I kept telling myself that life would get better   Well two years ago I made myself a promise  that if my life doesn t turn around after I put in all my effort  day and night  that I could finally do it without feeling any sadness or guilt  just peace    I ve tried hanging myself a few times but I pussied out   I tied a garbage bag over my head and filled it with duster  yet somehow I woke up half an hour later with the bag still over my head   I wanted to slice my arteries or veins but I couldn t get over the quick action of it   Now I think I have the solution   I can hook up a needle or   or   as if I were drawing blood  but just have it drip into a bucket   Just chill out  watch some TV while I start to get light headed and go to sleep  like I ve wanted for   years To those that say it will get better  you re partially correct   It only gets better so it can get even worse later   I never thought things could work out so well after hard work and then have everything dissolve as if it never happened   And the one last thing that makes me absolutely sure that I want to die is that I get no sense of satisfaction out of anything I do  ever   Helping people  projects  jobs  nothing   And even if I didn t have to worry about work or money  I know life s problems will still follow me to the grave   There s no point in running from the dragon    billion dollars wouldn t make me change my decision   At best  it might delay it   I ve got one more month of rent and then I m going to drain all my blood   I will also be removing myself from the organ donar list so no one will be able to live a happy life at the expense of my shitty one
summary: Two years ago I made a promise to kill myself if my life doesn't turn around. Now I think I have the solution. I have one more month of rent to pay and then I'm going to drain all my blood and remove myself from the organ donor list.

text: To all the people in their  sAll of your feelings are justified  The thing is  as a   year old who s dealt with depression and suicidal thoughts since I was YOUR age  take a leap of faith when I tell you that it s going to be ok  The majority of posts here seem to come from people in their  s and specifically early  s   Look I get it  Today sucks  Tomorrow might suck worse but you killing yourself does nothing positive and isn t that the one thing you all want  Weather  whoever reads this is going through severe anxiety or depression suicide is NOT the answer  I can fucking promise you that no matter how you plan and think about killing your self  it s not the answer  The answer is to internally fight those thoughts that drag you into the dark abyss and say  no fuck you depression  anxiety  I choose  I fucking choose when I go  Not you  fucker   We all have low points and when we re in them we feel like that s our world but the truth is you could walk a block in any direction and realize it s not  Mental health is a struggle but you need to exhaust every avenue in order to beat that fucking demon into the ground  Curb stomp that depression monster until it can t get up   Do what you all have to do so you don t want to hurt yourself or someone else
summary: Suicide is not the answer to depression and anxiety. Mental health is a struggle but you need to exhaust every avenue in order to beat the demon into the ground and fight the depression.    It might be worse tomorrow but it's better than killing yourself.
